results.title: Pharmacotherapy in Clinical Trials for Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
results.text_hl: Although the meta-analysis showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use was associated with lower @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAA@@@ growth and @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAA@@@-related events, all of the included studies about @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ were cohort studies or case-control studies.
